fitEllipse(Is, Qs, verbose=False)[source]#

fits an ellipse using least squares method from online

Then processes the fit parameters into more sensble things fixing the order of major and minor axes and fixing branch cuts in inverse trig functions

Returns: [major axis, minor axis] , [x0, y0], angle of major axis to x axis

angle in radians
